translations: n.克林普纶（类似涤纶的变形聚酯丝，商标名）

phrs.translation: 克林普纶变形聚酯丝, 克林普纶, 克里普纶

sentences.sentence: Better to opt for the more modern low-heels which don't reference too closely anything our mothers and grandmothers might have worn with their Crimplene A-line shifts and chain-belts in the Sixties.
sentences.translation: 最好选择更为现代的低跟鞋，不要和奶奶妈妈辈A字形克林普纶质地的鞋款还有六十年代的链带混为一谈。
